code: export var SET_TASKS='SET_TASKS';export var SET_TASKS_ID='SET_TASKS_ID';export var setTasks=function setTasks(tasks){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:SET_TASKS,payload:tasks});};};export var setTasksID=function setTasksID(tasksID){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:SET_TASKS_ID,payload:tasksID});};};
